name: Vroum vroum
description:
Hello, this is my cool car playground, join in and play alone or with friends in a pointless stadium

-----

you need gamepads to play

-----

First mini game in ! 

this is a bomb game, if you touch the bomb (it's a red sphere for now), the countdown will appear and you'll explode when it reaches 0.

The only way to get rid of the bomb is to touch another player

Enjoy <3

-----

Controls (Xbox 360 Gamepad)

Right Joystick Click (R3)  to join the game

Move with Left Joystick

Turbo with A (keep pressing A the whole time, it's better like this)

Honk with Y

Backward Driving with B

Do rad flips with X

If you're ever stuck, the car will get up on its own

(the Left joystick gets you back on tracks too

but it can help you do mad tricks when you're on the wall)

-----

v_04 : Camera zoom/dezoom working,the car don't get stuck anymore, gonna produce more assets, do some lvl design
